comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/829
Date: 2024-07-08 07:36:16 +0000

jdk21u-dev backport request
I would like to have the patch in OpenJDK jdk21u-dev as well, for parity with OracleJDK. The backport is clean and low risk.
